summary.span: 表示列印系統物件的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of print system objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您是衍生自，您可能想要從該類別的物件集合的衍生。If you derive a class from , you may want to derive a collection of objects of that class from . > [!CAUTION] > 類別內命名空間不支援為 Windows 服務或 ASP.NET 應用程式或服務中使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 嘗試使用這些類別時，這些應用程式類型的其中一個內可能會產生無法預期的問題，例如會受到影響服務的效能和執行階段例外狀況。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 如果您想要從 Windows Form 應用程式列印，請參閱命名空間。If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the namespace.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫，您必須釋放所有參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's method.

Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (A_0 As Boolean)

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用方法和方法。This method is called by the public method and the method. 叫用受保護未命名的布林參數設定為具有方法`true`。 invokes the protected method with the unnamed Boolean parameter set to `true`. 叫用參數設為`false`。 invokes with the parameter set to `false`. 布林值參數時`true`，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the Boolean parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
